form-area.group-subTitle-brandName: Give your brand a name that people will recognize.
form-area.description: Your brand name is the foundation of your identity. A well-chosen name makes your brand memorable and helps people connect with your business.
form-area.description-follow: Choose a name that represents your vision or cements your products and services.
form-area.brandname-tagline-description: Create a phrase that captures your brand’s essence.
form-area.tagline-inputlabel: Do you want to use a tagline?
form-area.tagline-inputfield-description: A great tagline strengthens your brand by making it more memorable and meaningful.

preview-area.group-subTitle-tagline: See how your tagline looks in action.

form-area.group-subTitle-industry: Defining your industry helps shape the overall look and feel of your brand.
form-area.description-follow: select the industry that matches closest
form-area.values-description: explanation about what values could mean for you as a brand
form-area.values-description-2: Select the values you want to express as your brand (hold 'Control' or 'Command' on Mac)

preview-area.preview-description: A snapshot of your brand’s identity based on your choices.
